brands.name: Arturo Fuente
brands.description: One of the most prestigious and respected brands in the cigar industry, known for exceptional quality and craftsmanship.

products.name: Hemingway
products.description: A classic figurado with a distinctive shape and balanced flavor profile.

products.name: Don Carlos
products.description: Created in honor of Carlos Fuente Sr., offering a rich and complex smoking experience.

products.name: Opus X
products.description: The first Dominican puro, a powerful and luxurious cigar with limited production.

products.name: Chateau Fuente
products.description: A smooth and well-balanced cigar from the Gran Reserva line.

brands.name: Padron
brands.description: Family-owned operation known for consistently excellent box-pressed cigars with aged tobaccos.

products.name: 1964 Anniversary Series
products.description: Box-pressed anniversary series with aged tobacco, available in natural or maduro.

products.name: 1926 Series
products.description: Commemorating José O. Padrón's birth year, a premium, full-bodied experience.

products.name: Family Reserve
products.description: Ultra-premium line with 10-year aged tobacco.

products.name: Padrón Series
products.description: Box-pressed format with the classic Padrón flavor profile at a more affordable price.

brands.name: Cohiba
brands.description: Originally a Cuban brand, the Dominican Cohiba is produced by General Cigar and is known for its premium quality.

products.name: Red Dot
products.description: The flagship Dominican Cohiba with a distinctive red dot on the band.

products.name: Black
products.description: A dark, rich smoke with a Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper.

products.name: Nicaragua
products.description: Blended with Nicaraguan tobacco for a bolder Cohiba experience.

products.name: Macassar
products.description: A premium offering with a complex blend of tobaccos.

brands.name: Montecristo
brands.description: One of the world's most recognized cigar brands with a reputation for consistency and quality.

products.name: Classic
products.description: The iconic torpedo shape, a benchmark for all others in this format.

products.name: White Series
products.description: A milder offering with a creamy, sophisticated profile.

products.name: Platinum
products.description: A more full-bodied offering with a Mexican wrapper.

products.name: Espada
products.description: The first Montecristo made entirely of Nicaraguan tobacco.

brands.name: Romeo y Julieta
brands.description: A historic brand dating back to 1875, known for its consistency and wide range of offerings.

products.description: The classic blend that has been satisfying cigar smokers for generations.

products.name: Reserva Real
products.description: An upgrade to the classic 1875 with premium tobacco.

products.name: Vintage
products.description: A more robust offering with vintage tobaccos.

products.name: Romeo
products.description: A bold, modern take on the classic Romeo y Julieta profile.

brands.name: Davidoff
brands.description: The epitome of luxury in the cigar world, known for its craftsmanship and refined taste.

products.name: Signature
products.description: The classic Davidoff blend in an elegant panetela format.

products.name: Nicaragua
products.description: Davidoff's first Nicaraguan puro, offering a bold departure from their traditional blends.

products.name: Winston Churchill
products.description: Named after the famous British statesman, a complex and refined smoke.

products.name: Grand Cru
products.description: A classic Davidoff blend with the refinement of a grand wine.

brands.name: Oliva
brands.description: Family-owned company known for high-quality Nicaraguan cigars at reasonable prices.

products.name: Serie V
products.description: Oliva's flagship blend, known for its power and complexity.

products.name: Serie V Melanio
products.description: A premium extension of the Serie V line with an Ecuadorian wrapper.

products.name: Serie G
products.description: Features a genuine African Cameroon wrapper for a nutty, sweet profile.

products.name: Serie O
products.description: A Nicaraguan puro with a smooth, balanced character.

brands.name: Perdomo
brands.description: Known for its commitment to quality and variety of wrapper options for many of its lines.

products.name: 10th Anniversary Champagne
products.description: Features a creamy Connecticut wrapper aged and fermented for 6 years.

products.name: 20th Anniversary
products.description: Commemorating 20 years of Perdomo cigars, available in three wrapper varieties.

products.name: Habano
products.description: Triple-fermented wrapper aged in bourbon barrels, available in three wrapper types.

products.name: Lot 23
products.description: Made from tobacco grown on a single lot of land for consistency.

brands.name: My Father
brands.description: Founded by Don Pepin Garcia, known for traditional Cuban-style cigars made in Nicaragua.

products.name: Le Bijou 1922
products.description: A tribute to Jose Pepin Garcia's father, featuring a dark Habano wrapper.

products.name: The Judge
products.description: A powerful blend with a combination of Nicaraguan tobaccos.

products.name: Flor de Las Antillas
products.description: A medium to full-bodied smoke with a sun-grown wrapper.

products.name: La Opulencia
products.description: Features a dark Mexican San Andres wrapper and Nicaraguan fillers.

brands.name: Rocky Patel
brands.description: Known for its wide range of blends and price points, with a reputation for consistency.

products.name: Vintage 1990
products.description: Features a 12-year-aged Honduran Broadleaf wrapper.

products.name: The Edge
products.description: Full-bodied blend available in multiple wrapper types.

products.name: Decade
products.description: Created to celebrate Rocky Patel's 10th anniversary in the business.

products.name: Sun Grown Maduro
products.description: A maduro extension of the popular Sun Grown line.

brands.name: La Flor Dominicana
brands.description: Known for strong, full-bodied cigars and innovative shapes like the distinctive Chisel.

products.name: Double Ligero
products.description: Features a unique flat head and powerful ligero tobaccos.

products.name: Andalusian Bull
products.description: Inspired by Spanish bullfighting, with a unique figurado shape.

products.name: Air Bender
products.description: Named after martial arts, a powerful, full-bodied smoke.

products.name: Cameroon Cabinet
products.description: A medium-bodied offering featuring a African Cameroon wrapper.

brands.name: Plasencia
brands.description: One of the largest tobacco growers in the world, now producing their own branded cigars.

products.name: Alma Fuerte
products.description: A premium Nicaraguan puro with a hexagonal pressing.

products.name: Alma del Campo
products.description: The second release in the Alma series, representing countryside.

products.name: Cosecha 146
products.description: Features tobacco from the 146th harvest of the Plasencia family.

products.name: Reserva Original
products.description: An organic Nicaraguan puro with a smooth, balanced profile.

brands.name: AJ Fernandez
brands.description: A rising star in the industry known for creating full-flavored blends and collaborations with other brands.

products.name: New World
products.description: Commemorates Columbus' discovery of tobacco in the New World.

products.name: Enclave
products.description: A collaboration between AJ and his father Ismael.

products.name: Bellas Artes
products.description: Features a unique hybrid wrapper and artistic packaging.

products.name: San Lotano
products.description: A revival of a pre-Cuban Revolution brand with a powerful blend.

brands.name: Ashton
brands.description: A premium brand made by the Fuente family, known for quality and consistency.

products.name: VSG (Virgin Sun Grown)
products.description: A full-bodied offering with an Ecuador Sumatra wrapper grown in direct sunlight.

products.name: Cabinet Selection
products.description: A smooth, refined smoke with well-aged Dominican tobaccos.

products.name: ESG (Estate Sun Grown)
products.description: A limited edition with a sun-grown wrapper from the Fuente estate.

products.name: Symmetry
products.description: The first Ashton to include Nicaraguan tobacco in the blend.

brands.name: Macanudo
brands.description: One of the best-selling premium cigar brands, known especially for mild, Connecticut-wrapped cigars.

products.name: Café
products.description: The classic mild Macanudo blend, known for its smooth character.

products.name: Inspirado Orange
products.description: Part of the Inspirado line, offering a medium-bodied experience.

products.name: Maduro
products.description: The maduro version of the classic Café, with a sweet character.

products.name: Cru Royale
products.description: A more modern, fuller-bodied addition to the Macanudo line.

brands.name: Bolivar
brands.description: A legendary Cuban brand known for its strong, full-bodied flavor profile and excellent construction.

products.name: Royal Coronas
products.description: A robust smoke with earthy, leathery flavors and a touch of cocoa.

products.name: Belicosos Finos
products.description: A pyramid shape that concentrates the full-bodied flavors towards the tapered head.

products.name: Coronas Junior
products.description: A smaller format that delivers the classic Bolivar strength in a shorter smoke.

products.name: Libertador
products.description: A La Casa del Habano exclusive with a powerful yet balanced profile.

brands.name: Cohiba
brands.description: The flagship Cuban brand, originally created for Fidel Castro before becoming commercially available in 1982.

products.name: Behike 52
products.description: Part of the ultra-premium Behike line featuring the rare medio tiempo tobacco leaf.

products.name: Robusto
products.description: A classic format showcasing Cohiba's creamy, grassy flavor profile with notes of coffee and spice.

products.name: Esplendidos
products.description: A majestic Churchill offering complex flavors that develop throughout the long smoke.

products.name: Siglo VI
products.description: Part of the Siglo line with honey, coffee, and wood notes in perfect balance.

brands.name: H. Upmann
brands.description: A historic Cuban brand dating back to 1844, known for its medium-bodied profile and refined character.

products.name: Magnum 50
products.description: A modern classic with notes of cedar, toast, and a subtle sweetness.

products.name: Half Corona
products.description: A short smoke that preserves the brand's elegant character with notes of nuts and cedar.

products.name: Sir Winston
products.description: A prestigious Churchill named after Sir Winston Churchill, with complex refinement and balance.

products.name: Connoisseur No. 1
products.description: A well-balanced cigar with a creamy profile and hints of spice and vanilla.

brands.name: Hoyo de Monterrey
brands.description: One of the milder Cuban brands, known for its delicate flavor profile and elegance.

products.name: Epicure No. 2
products.description: A benchmark Cuban robusto with a delicate, aromatic character and notes of honey and grass.

products.name: Double Coronas
products.description: A long, elegant smoke with subtle complexity that develops throughout.

products.name: Petit Robustos
products.description: A compact version of the Epicure series, perfect for a shorter smoke.

products.name: Epicure Especial
products.description: A larger ring gauge offering with the characteristic honey and herb notes of the brand.

brands.name: Partagas
brands.description: One of Cuba's oldest and most respected brands, known for its rich, spicy character.

products.name: Serie D No. 4
products.description: One of Cuba's most popular robustos, with a rich, spicy profile and excellent construction.

products.name: Lusitanias
products.description: A majestic double corona with complex transitions of spice, wood, and earth.

products.name: Serie P No. 2
products.description: A torpedo shape that concentrates the brand's characteristic spicy profile.

products.name: Shorts
products.description: A short format offering the classic Partagas flavor in a quick smoke.

brands.name: Punch
brands.description: A traditional Cuban brand dating back to 1840, known for its full-bodied, rich character.

products.name: Punch Punch
products.description: The signature vitola of the brand with a woody, leathery profile and subtle sweetness.

products.name: Double Corona
products.description: A long, elegant smoke with rich tobacco flavors complemented by earthy notes.

products.name: Short de Punch
products.description: A more recent addition to the line, offering the brand's character in a shorter format.
A well-balanced cigar with notes of cedar, coffee, and a touch of spice.

brands.name: Quai d'Orsay
brands.description: Originally created for the French market, known for its mild to medium body and elegant refinement.

products.name: No. 50
products.description: A honey-colored wrapper and delicate floral and citrus notes make this a refined smoke.

products.name: No. 54
products.description: A larger format showcasing the brand's subtle complexity with notes of cream, vanilla, and light spice.

products.name: Coronas Claro
products.description: A classic corona size with the brand's characteristic refinement and delicacy.

products.name: No. 52
products.description: A newer addition to the line with a perfect balance of cream, wood, and honey notes.

brands.name: Trinidad
brands.description: Originally only available as diplomatic gifts, this exclusive brand is known for its elegance and complexity.

products.name: Vigia
products.description: A short, stout format with complex notes of honey, spice, and a subtle citrus undertone.

products.name: Fundadores
products.description: The original Trinidad size, an elegant and slender cigar with remarkable complexity.

products.name: Reyes
products.description: A small format that concentrates the brand's flavor profile into a shorter smoke.

products.name: Coloniales
products.description: A medium-sized format with perfectly balanced flavors of honey, cedar, and light spice.

brands.name: Alec Bradley
brands.description: Founded in 1996, Alec Bradley has become known for complex, well-constructed cigars with bold flavors.

products.name: Prensado
products.description: A box-pressed offering with complex notes of leather, earth, and cocoa.

products.name: Tempus
products.description: Features a rare Criollo 98 wrapper with a balance of spice, leather, and coffee notes.

products.name: Black Market
products.description: A smooth, complex blend with notes of sweet spice, cocoa, and earth.

products.name: Mundial
products.description: A special project cigar with a rounded complexity and perfect construction.

brands.name: Caldwell
brands.description: A boutique brand founded by Robert Caldwell, known for unique blends and creative branding.

products.name: The King is Dead
products.description: A Dominican puro with a complex, balanced profile of cedar, cream, and gentle spice.

products.name: Long Live the King
products.description: A bold, full-flavored cigar with notes of earth, cedar, and pepper.

products.name: Eastern Standard
products.description: Features a hybrid Connecticut wrapper with a creamy, balanced profile.

products.name: Blind Man's Bluff
products.description: A collaborative blend with notes of cedar, cream, and gentle spice.

brands.name: Camacho
brands.description: Known for bold, full-bodied cigars with a focus on authentic Corojo tobacco.

products.name: Corojo
products.description: The flagship blend featuring authentic Corojo tobacco with bold pepper and leather notes.

products.name: Connecticut
products.description: A more approachable Camacho with a Connecticut wrapper but still maintaining character.

products.name: Triple Maduro
products.description: The first cigar to use maduro tobacco for wrapper, binder, and filler, offering intense richness.

products.name: Diploma
products.description: A special blend featuring rare original Corojo tobacco with intense, complex flavors.

brands.name: Drew Estate
brands.description: An innovative company known for breaking tradition with infused cigars and bold traditional blends.

products.name: Liga Privada No. 9
products.description: A full-bodied, complex smoke originally created for personal use by the company founder.

products.name: Undercrown
products.description: Created by factory rollers as an alternative to the Liga Privada they were smoking too much of.

products.name: ACID Blondie
products.description: The most popular infused cigar, featuring a sweet-tipped wrapper and aromatic botanicals.

products.name: Herrera Esteli
products.description: A Cuban-inspired blend created by master blender Willy Herrera.

brands.name: Joya de Nicaragua
brands.description: Nicaragua's oldest premium cigar manufacturer, known for strong, bold cigars that showcase Nicaraguan tobacco.

products.name: Antaño 1970
products.description: A powerhouse Nicaraguan puro recalling the bold cigars of the 1970s.

products.name: Celebracion
products.description: A more refined smoke than the Antaño but still showcasing Nicaraguan power.

products.name: Cuatro Cinco
products.description: A limited edition created to celebrate the company's 45th anniversary.

products.name: Cabinetta
products.description: Features a dual wrapper design with Connecticut on the body and Nicaraguan at the head.

brands.name: Zino
brands.description: A subsidiary of Davidoff, offering premium cigars with a contemporary approach and elegant profile.

products.name: Platinum Crown
products.description: A smooth, balanced cigar with a creamy character and notes of cedar and light spice.

products.name: Z-Class
products.description: A more robust offering with a complex blend of tobaccos and a leathery profile.

products.name: Nicaragua
products.description: A modern blend focusing on Nicaraguan tobaccos for a bolder Zino experience.

products.name: Platinum Scepter
products.description: An elegant, long format with the refined character that Zino is known for.
